issue.title: builds failing on master branch with apt-get error
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-205](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-205). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

Logs from: https://travis-ci.org/apache/arrow/jobs/131207432
0.50s$ sudo -E apt-get -yq --no-install-suggests --no-install-recommends --force-yes install clang-format-3.7 clang-tidy-3.7 gcc-4.9 g++-4.9 gdb ccache cmake valgrind

E: Couldn't find any package by regex 'g++-4.9'

apt-get install failed

The command "sudo -E apt-get -yq --no-install-suggests --no-install-recommends --force-yes install clang-format-3.7 clang-tidy-3.7 gcc-4.9 g++-4.9 gdb ccache cmake valgrind" failed and exited with 100 during .

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-205?focusedCommentId=15294296) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Seems to have been a transient launchpad downtime issue, the recent patch build passed: https://travis-ci.org/apache/arrow/builds

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-205?focusedCommentId=15368627) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Builds seem to be passing again.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-205?focusedCommentId=17585870) by @toddfarmer:*
Transitioning issue from Resolved to Closed to based on resolution field value.
